english.start:

/newchat - Create new chat

/generateimage - Generate an image

/aspectratio - Change aspect ratio of generated images

/chattitle - Display the title of a chat

/currentchattitle - Display the title of the current chat

/chathistory - Display the history of a chat

/filechat - Send a file to a chat

/language - Change language
